name: Cifrovod [early test]
description:
The game, based on my "Up to Eleven" concept - "a 15-puzzle with a twist". An early version, uploaded for testing purposes. Will be glad to receive a feedback.

Current version - Cifrovod 0.10.1

To do list:

  • Bug fixes
  • Puzzle generator improvements
  • Marathon and Sprint modes
  • Graphics and performance improvements
  • Online leaderboards
  • Online PvP
  • Sound
  • Windows, MacOS, Linux, IOS and Android release
  • ...

Current progress:

  • General mechanics and interfaces
  • Puzzle generator with difficulty level adjustments
  • Basic modes: a training mode and a simple tutorial
  • Offline time records tracker

Enjoy! )
